description: GE A1456W Smart Series Digital Camera with 14MP, 5X Optical Zoom, 2.7"LCD, 28mm Wide Angle Lens and advanced features including Auto Scene Detection, Pan-Capture Panorama, Image Stabilization, Smile & Blink Detection, Face Detection, Face Auto Exposure, Red-Eye Removal, High Dynamic Range. Powered by AA battery.
title: GE Smart A1456W-BK 14 MP with 5 x Optical Zoom Digital Camera, Black
